TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RichTextBoxSelectionTypes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of selection in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration to determine the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> class. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property can return any combination of values from this enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSelectionTypes Empty = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No text is selected in the current selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSelectionTypes MultiChar = int32(4)

Docs.summary: More than one character is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSelectionTypes MultiObject = int32(8)

Docs.summary: More than one Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) object is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSelectionTypes Object = int32(2)

Docs.summary: At least one Object Linking and Embedding (OLE) object is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSelectionTypes Text = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The current selection contains only text.
